CustomField.description: Ticked for Closed Opps when 90 days have passed since the Award Date. Used as criteria for Validation Rule and messaging component to user.
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName != "Target", IsClosed = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Sub_Stage__c, "7.1 Written Confirmation")), CloseDate <= TODAY() - 90 )
CustomField.label: Opportunity Record Lock
